description:
The European Commission has classified Apple’s iPadOS as a “gatekeeper” under the EU’s new tech competition rules, subjecting it to strict requirements aimed at promoting fairness and expanding consumer choice. “The Digital Markets Act is a dynamic tool which allows us to tackle the realities of digital markets,” said Margrethe Vestager, the EU’s competition chief... Read more »

The post EU classifies iPadOS as a ‘gatekeeper’ subject to DMA rules appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: EU classifies iPadOS as a ‘gatekeeper’ subject to DMA rules
